title: Students with Fluctuating Performance
description: The school wants to identify students whose performance has fluctuated significantly across subjects. They define significant fluctuation as having a difference of 40 or more between the highest and lowest subject scores. Write a query to list the full names of students who have such fluctuating performance.
hint:
To find the range of scores so wide,
Calculate the max and min, don't hide.
Subtract them to find the gap,
Filter those who meet the trap.
